thag10.5:0.4_0: this is the mark of carved.
thag10.5:1.1_0: Filled with different kinds of dirt,
thag10.5:1.4_0: a huge boil, a bad wound,
thag10.5:10.2_0: like a snake smeared with dung,
thag10.5:10.4_0: and realize quenching free of defilements.
thag10.5:3.3_0: clothed in a jacket of skin,
thag10.5:4.1_0: Held together by a skeleton of bones,
thag10.5:4.4_0: due to a complex of many things.
thag10.5:5.1_0: We set out in the certainty of death,
thag10.5:5.2_0: in the presence of the King of Death;
thag10.5:5.3_0: and having discarded the body right here,
thag10.5:5.4_0: a person goes where he likes.
thag10.5:6.3_0: this body is sinking in the flood,
thag10.5:6.4_0: caught in the net of the underlying tendencies.
thag10.5:7.1_0: if it has been brought to him,
thag10.5:7.3_0: stuck to the root of craving,
thag10.5:8.1_0: that is how the body goes on,
